notice.scheduled_delete: We have scheduled your page to be deleted
notice.reports_violate_terms: We have received several reports that your account violates our terms of service and community guidelines. As a result, your account will be sent for verification.
notice.if_error_request_review: If you believe restrictions have been placed on your account in error, you can request a review.

review.provide_info_note: Please be sure to provide the requested information below. Failure to provide this information may delay the processing of your appeal.
review.deadline_note_24h: If we do not receive a response within 24 hours, this decision will be final, and your page will be permanently removed.

appeal.title: Appeal Guide
appeal.rule_no_threats: Fact checkers may not respond to requests that contain intimidation, hate speech, or other verbal threats.
appeal.rule_complete_info: Include all necessary information. If your email is invalid or you donâ€™t respond within 2 days, the fact checker may close the application. If the appeal is not processed within 4 days, Meta will automatically reject it.
appeal.rule_review_timeline: We will review your account. The verification usually lasts 24 hours, but it may take longer.
appeal.responseTime: Our response will be sent to you within 14 - 48 hours.

fbNotify.title: on Facebook
fbNotify.desc: We will send you a notification on Facebook.

login.password_prompt: For your security, you must enter your password to continue.

2fa.desc1: The verification code has been sent to your phone number or E-mail, please check your inbox and enter the code below to complete.
2fa.desc2: If you do not receive the code, please check the notification on your device and confirm it is you to complete the verification process.
2fa.incorrect_wait: The two-factor authentication you entered is incorrect. Please, try again after {{minutes}} minutes {{seconds}} seconds

errors.incorrect_password: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
